alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 5:07PM EDT until March 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN LAURENS AND NORTH CENTRAL DODGE COUNTIES... At 507 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plainfield, or 7 miles northeast of Eastman, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cadwell, Rentz, Lowery, Plainfield and Cedar Grove. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
